snippet: Helena Costa, the former coach of the Qatar and Iran women’s national teams, will become the first woman to coach a men’s professional team in France.
abstract: Clermont Foot 63, a second-division soccer club in France, announces that Helena Costa will take over as its manager at the end of current season; Costa will be the first woman to be manager in one of the top two divisions of one of Europe's five major professional leagues--England, France, Germany, Italy and Spain.
lead_paragraph: Helena Costa, the former coach of the Qatar and Iran women’s national teams, will become the first woman to coach a men’s professional team in France.

headline.seo: Hired by Clermont Foot, Helena Costa Sets Major Soccer Milestone
headline.main: French Soccer Club Hires Woman to Coach Its Men
headline.print_headline: A Woman Fulfills a Dream of Coaching a Men’s Pro Team
